text.textFrame: DOM parsing creates an in-memory tree that mirrors the structure of the parsed XML document. Subsequently, you can navigate the tree using the DOM API. In this case, you'll see how to iterate over the parsed XML document and output element and attribute node values.
You can obtain an element's text by first retrieving the text node from the element node and then requesting the value of the text node.
The DOM parsing API classes are in the oracle.xml.parser.v2 package and the DOM parser factory and parser classes are in the oracle.xml.jaxp package.
textText textText textText textText textText textText textText
